pages.text: The $(mob)Spider$() is a common monster that spawns in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$(), including the surface at night. It can climb walls and spot players through walls, which it attacks on sight unless it is under sunlight.$(p)It attacks by leaping at its target, dealing damage on contact.
$(mob)Spiders$() drop $(item)String$() on death. It can be crafted into various items, such as $(item)Bows$() or $(item)Fishing Rods$().
$(mob)Spiders$() may also sometimes drop a $(item)Spider Eye$() on death. It can be brewed into $(item)Potions of Poison$().
